name: awesome-go
description: A curated list of awesome Go frameworks, libraries and software

name: go
description: The Go programming language

name: gin
description: Gin is a HTTP web framework written in Go (Golang). It features a Martini-like API with much better performance -- up to 40 times faster. If you need smashing performance, get yourself some Gin.

name: syncthing
description: Open Source Continuous File Synchronization

name: prometheus
description: The Prometheus monitoring system and time series database.

name: pocketbase
description: Open Source realtime backend in 1 file

name: cli
description: GitHub’s official command line tool

name: fiber
description: ⚡️ Express inspired web framework written in Go

name: viper
description: Go configuration with fangs

name: websocket
description: Package gorilla/websocket is a fast, well-tested and widely used WebSocket implementation for Go.

name: glance
description: A self-hosted dashboard that puts all your feeds in one place

name: excelize
description: Go language library for reading and writing Microsoft Excel™ (XLAM / XLSM / XLSX / XLTM / XLTX) spreadsheets

name: trufflehog
description: Find, verify, and analyze leaked credentials

name: kratos
description: Headless cloud-native authentication and identity management written in Go. Scales to a billion+ users. Replace Homegrown, Auth0, Okta, Firebase with better UX and DX. Passkeys, Social Sign In, OIDC, Magic Link, Multi-Factor Auth, SMS, SAML, TOTP, and more. Runs everywhere, runs best on Ory Network.

name: zerolog
description: Zero Allocation JSON Logger

name: sftpgo
description: Full-featured and highly configurable SFTP, HTTP/S, FTP/S and WebDAV server - S3, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob

name: dice
description: DiceDB is an open-source, fast, reactive, in-memory database optimized for modern hardware.

name: terragrunt
description: Terragrunt is a flexible orchestration tool that allows Infrastructure as Code written in OpenTofu/Terraform to scale.

name: WatchYourLAN
description: Lightweight network IP scanner. Can be used to notify about new hosts and monitor host online/offline history

name: kargo
description: Application lifecycle orchestration

name: mcp-go
description: A Go implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP), enabling seamless integration between LLM applications and external data sources and tools.

name: mcp-golang
description: Write Model Context Protocol servers in few lines of go code. Docs at https://mcpgolang.com
